sources.title: Gremlin (Full Movie) Horror, Comedy, 2017
sources.description:
Adam receives a mysterious box from a relative containing a creature that will kill everyone he cares about. He can't destroy it. He can't escape it. The only way to be rid of the curse is to give the box to someone he loves….

Directed by Ryan Bellgardt
2017
Starring Adam Hampton, Kristy K. Boone, Catcher Stair, Katie Burgess, Caleb Milby, Michael Page, Connie D. Franklin

Edited for YouTube ad standards
